<title level="1" right="Action">[Long-Term Rest](/Actions.aspx?ID=521) <actions string="" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Downtime" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=49" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 481 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can spend an entire day and night resting during downtime to recover Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum 1) multiplied by twice your level.
name: Long-Term Rest
